name: XWUI App Bar Component
description: Application bar component for layout headers. Supports logo, title, navigation, and action areas. Can be positioned as static, fixed, or sticky with various variants and color schemes.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

position.description: Position behavior of the app bar

variant.description: Visual variant of the app bar

size.description: Height size of the app bar

color.description: Color scheme of the app bar

bordered.description: Whether to show a border at the bottom

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the app bar

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

logo.description: Logo element or HTML string to display on the left

navigation.description: Navigation element to display in the center

actions.description: Action buttons/elements to display on the right
